name: quenelle
content:

a smooth mixture of meat or fish and egg that has been formed into a curved shape like an egg and cooked

a carefully shaped small amount of a soft food such as ice cream or mashed potato : You can shape smooth quenelles of meringue between two spoons dipped in hot water.
William Shaw/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
